---
title: "Class 1"
output: html_notebook
---

Load Roster
```{r}
class = read.csv('Class_roster.csv',header = F,stringsAsFactors = F)[-c(1,2),1]
# length(class)
class = unname(sapply(class,function(x) paste(strsplit(x,', ')[[1]][2:1],collapse=' ')))
class
```

Do randomization
```{r}
set.seed(1)
group = rep(c('Sit','Stand'),each = length(class)/2)
randomization = sample(group)
sitting_group = class[randomization == 'Sit']
sitting_group
```

```{r}
library(googlesheets4)
library(ggplot2)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("dplyr"))
pulse_data = read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1CkfvqTSFrOX-Gwk5pIijkFxBtDbyEZcCf1LJ4Cvdw3I/edit#gid=1764344714')
colnames(pulse_data)[3] = 'Pulse'
pulse_data = na.omit(pulse_data)
ggplot(pulse_data,aes(x=Treatment,y=Pulse)) + geom_jitter(width=.25,height=0)
```
